statements: DELETE FROM user_auth_data WHERE access_level < 3 AND device_id = 1234;
DELETE FROM user_auth_data WHERE user_id = 1 AND access_level > 1;
DELETE FROM user_auth_data WHERE device_id = 100 AND (username = 'admin' OR username = 'root');
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 20 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM device_access WHERE user_id = 3 AND device_id = 2;
DELETE FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 100 AND role_id = 1;
DELETE FROM devices WHERE user_id = 100 AND device_id = 1;
